snippet.title: Capcom Generation 2 - Sega Saturn - Gameplay Video (720p)
snippet.description:
An in-depth look at Capcom Generation 2: Chronicles of Arthur, Randomised Gaming looks at all three Ghosts'n Goblins games included on the collection along with the bonus material.

Time stamp for the video is as follows:
Intro & Bonus Material - 00:00
Ghosts'n Goblins - 25:50
Ghouls'n Ghosts - 37:35
Super Ghouls'n Ghosts - 53:20

Also known as: カプコン ジェネレーション －第2集 魔界と騎士－

Check out our review of Capcom Generation 2 over at the Randomised Gaming blog:
http://randomisedgaming.tumblr.com/post/61494153015/randomised-gaming-vol-2-review-capcom-generation-2

Loading times are unedited, but a number of deaths while playing have been removed. Footage contains the first five levels of the first two games and six from Super Ghouls'n Ghosts. All the bonus material has been unlocked for this video. Super Ghouls'n Ghosts has reduced slowdown from the Super Nintendo original and an altered aspect ratio due to the Sega Saturn supporting different resolutions to the SNES. 

Also released on the PlayStation if you are a fan of the Ghosts'n Goblins series this collection is a dream come true.

While Capcom Generation 2 hasn't been reissued, all the Ghosts'n Goblins series games included on this collection have since appeared on other Capcom game compilations.

Release: 1998
Developer: Capcom 
Publisher: Capcom / 株式会社カプコン
Format: Sega Saturn (SS) / セガサターン

Randomised Gaming blog: http://randomisedgaming.tumblr.com  
Twitter: https://twitter.com/rdmdgaming 

Recorded directly from a Sega Saturn using an Elgato Game Capture HD. Recorded via composite cable which isn't the best video output for Sega Saturn. This is an old video before we had the hardware to capture RGB Scart and HDMI scalers as seen in our videos from 2016 onwards.
